title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)


exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.


Histogram: English Scores Distribution of English Scores Shows how English scores are distributed among students.





Histogram: Maths Scores Distribution of Maths Scores Indicates the spread of mathematics performance.





Histogram: Science Scores Distribution of Science Scores Highlights how students are performing in Science.





Boxplots by Gender Boxplot of English Scores by Gender Compares distribution of English scores between genders.





Boxplot of Maths Scores by Gender





Boxplot of Science Scores by Gender





Scatter Plots English vs Maths Reveals the correlation between English and Math scores.





Maths vs Science Checks if high performance in Math relates to Science.





Bar Chart of Average Scores by Race Average Scores by Race Compares mean subject scores across different races.

title: Hands-on Exercise 2
text:
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggrepel, ggthemes, hrbrthemes, patchwork)


exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

title: ISSS608-VISUAL ANALYTICS
text: Welcome to ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications.
